attributes.action: Stop the government from making COVID vaccinations mandatory for NHS workers!
attributes.background: Think again-don’t sack the vital NHS staff that don’t want to be vaccinated, after all aren’t they the ones that worked all through the pandemic?!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Prohibit employers from requiring staff to be vaccinated against Covid-19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841
